Getting started¶

Ubuntu¶

#check images available
$ docker images
#REPOSITORY          TAG                 IMAGE ID            CREATED             SIZE
#hgraciacrag/ngasp   latest              37f20a0899e7        About an hour ago   1.3GB
#ngasp               latest              37f20a0899e7        About an hour ago   1.3GB
$ docker run -it --rm --net host hgraciacrag/ngasp

MAC¶

#check images available
$ docker images
#REPOSITORY          TAG                 IMAGE ID            CREATED             SIZE
#hgraciacrag/ngasp   latest              37f20a0899e7        About an hour ago   1.3GB
#ngasp               latest              37f20a0899e7        About an hour ago   1.3GB
$ docker run -it --rm -p 3000:3000 hgraciacrag/ngasp

NgaSP
